data.actual_result: Notes bar is highlighted with text line
data.expected_result: Notes bar should not be highlighted with text line
data.short_description: Notes show up as highlighted with text line on user profile if you swipe from user info to mutual and back while the notes header is partially or completely covered
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user with 6+ connected accounts  - Open their profile  - Scroll down on the user info tab so that the notes header is partially or completely covered  - Make sure the notes themselves or the bar where your type notes is fully visible  - Swipe right to mutual servers  - Swipe back to user info
